pageContext.other: 3 separate measurements are given, one for each axe-head. There is a '19' up in the collection section but I'm not exactly sure what it refers to as it's not written near the rest of the words there.
pageContext.associations: Hoard of 9 socketed axes, 12 fragments, 1 rectangular implement, 1 spear-head, 1 base of sword-blade, 1 socket of knife & 12 copper cakes
